channel.title: [639 Dementhium] Screw Shop.bat?
channel.description:
Is there an alternative to using Shop.bat? If I change any files to do with the shop files, it throws out errors and corrupts the shops.bin or replaces the shops configs with nulls.
Is there an alternative?
